name: Dragon Tile Puzzle
description:
Being smart and ingenious, you must be looking for a game that can challenge your mind!

Dragon Tile Puzzle (DTP) is a truly mind-twisting puzzle game. You must have an analytic mind and plan your moves in order to overcome the challenges. On solving the challenging puzzles, you unlock more puzzles and bonus stages! Don’t miss the chance to play one of the best puzzle game.

You can also challenge your friends with the puzzles you encountered. 

Sharing is fun!

* Note (1): this itch.io (PC) version has no ads and no in-app-purchase (by real world money).  

* Note (2): If you want to unlock more levels after finishing the main campaign, please go to get the mobile version, then you can purchase more campaigns.  You can even play the extra levels in this itch.io (PC) version if you login the game by the same L2MG account.


In Dragon Tile Puzzle you will find puzzles with creative gameplay, and different levels of difficulty from warm up to dizzy games. Only the smartest and swiftest can solve them all!


No two DTP puzzles are the same, and each of them are solved uniquely. In Random Mode, you can even replay the puzzles again and again.
Come and try them now.


You can earn FREE GEMS by inviting your friends to play DTP. Check how to use INVITATION CODE in the game.


If you solve enough puzzles, you would be able to unlock magic dragons. Collecting more dragons would further enable you to unlock more levels in the game. Only the smartest player can collect the rarest dragon.


In Dragon Tile Puzzle you can share puzzles with your friends, see who can solve the most difficult puzzle!


DRAGON TILE PUZZLE keep improving the game by new features and new puzzle. Stay tuned.

For all Puzzle Game Lovers, See You in DTP!

Game Language Support: English, Spanish, Chinese (Trad.)

Free Demo of Dragon Tile Puzzle (DTP) is available.
